title: Dawn's Testimony
meta_content: Did you know Jesus came to preach recovery of sight to the blind? Check this testimony out about Dawn and her vision!
content:
I was losing my sight slowly. The doctors told me "If you don't wear your glasses you will go blind." 
I came to this church and soon became born again. Pastor did the laying on of hands and my eyes were 
healed. Now I see as well as I did with the glasses. God really does care and loves us!

Dawn
